Ehugbo a na-akpọkarị Afikpo, bụ obodo nke abụọ kacha n'obodo ukwu na Ebonyi Steeti, Naijiria
Ọ bụ isi ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị ime obodo Afikpo North

Ọ dị na mpaghara ndịda Ebonyi steeti ma n'akụkụ ugwu site n'obodo Akpoha, n'akụkụ ndịda site na Unwana, na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ site na Edda LGA, n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ site na steeti Cross River na n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ site n'Amasiri
Afikpo gbasapụrụ ebe dị ihe dịka square kilomita 164 n'ihe a bu obodo dị na 6 degrees north latitude na 8 degrees east lonjituudu
Ọ nwere mpaghara ihe dịka square kilomita 64 (164 km2 )
Afikpo bụ ugwu ugwu n'agbanyeghị na ọ nọ na mpaghara dị ala na elu, nke na-arị elu 350 n'elu oke osimiri
Ọ bụ mpaghara mgbanwe n'etiti ahịhịa ahịhịa mepere emepe na oke ọhịa na-enwe nkezi mmiri ozuzo kwa afọ nke sentimita iri asaa na asaa (198). cm
